posts.post_content:
Only 90 beaters to go in my version of the Monster.  Looking to buy the worst of the worst condition t206's. I need a handful of SL's and about 75 remaining commons.

Torn, creased, dirty, holes, burnt, stained is all good.  The worse the better!

Please let me know what you have.
I've got a nasty raw speaker among 40 or 50 others toss me a list.

Jon-I have a really nasty Easterly, and an Abstein portrait. LMK if you need them.

Cheers,
Mike
[url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]
Mike- I appreciate the offer however I do have both already.  Thanks.

April bump.  Got a Speaker and a handful of commons last month.  Please let me know what you have.
Thanks-
Got my Hindu and a few more commons.  Still looking for many more beaters.  Please let me know what you have via PM.  Thank you.
June bump.  Slowly chipping away at the remaining 90.
Not sure my pm went through so I thought i would post here just in case. I have a George hunter piedmont back beater if interested.

I have a dozen that only you or their mother would love...can you send me a list, or do you prefer that I list mine?
Thanks,
James
